item.description:
Lively conversation in Spanish - Everyone who is attending will bring a holiday dish from their culture.

Please be prepared to talk about what you are bringing in Spanish!


From Hartford take Route 84 W and follow it until exit 38. Take exit 38 and follow Route 6. Then turn right onto Plainville Ave RT 177. Left on Lake Garda Dr, slight left onto Sunset Dr another slight left onto Birch ST. Birch St becomes Circle Dr. 28 Circle Drive will be on the left. It is a Blue House, Street Parking only.

Contact telephone numbers: Cell 860-9227997
Home 860-673-9678

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: Spanish Meet Up - Fiesta
